subject: Basketball
Education and Schools
lead_paragraph: During a game at DeWitt Clinton High School in the late 1920s, Lou Bender connected on a long two-handed set shot, prompting someone in the stands to shout, “Now that was a lulu of a basket.”.
snippet: During a game at DeWitt Clinton High School in the late 1920s, Lou Bender connected on a long two-handed set shot, prompting someone in the stands to shout, “Now that was a lulu of a basket.”.
